text: Balo -- ''ki! Ami ki allah chara an'ya prabhu khujambo, athaca tini'i saba-kichura rabba?’’ Ara pratyeka satta arjana kare na tara jan'ye chara, ara kono bharabahaka an'yera bhara bahana karabe na. Tarapara tomadera prabhura kache'i tomadera pratyabartana, takhana tini tomadera janiye debena ye-bisaye tomara matabheda ka’re calachile.
